titleStmt.title: Reflections to a late book, entituled, The genuine remains of Dr. Tho. Barlow late Bishop of Lincoln. Falsly pretended to be published from His Lordship's original papers. With a catalogue of Socinian writers.
titleStmt.author: Offley, William, 1659 or 60-1724.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Robert Clavell, at the Peacock in St. Paul's Church-Yard,

notesStmt.note: Caption title on p. 7 reads: Reflections on a late book, &c.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.

place.placeName: the Peacock in St. Paul's Church-Yard
